entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
